pageContext.claim: “And if you really think about it, I said to people, 'What's more important, the Golan Heights or the capital of Jerusalem by moving our embassy there?' He said, 'Neither, sir What you've done in Iran is more important than both of them.' I said, 'You know, I guess you're right when you think about it.'”
pageContext.analysis: Trump repeated this same story — word for word — naming three separate prominent Jewish people and claiming each of them had the same response.
